cgc_sync__Sync_Mobile_App_Depl_Pkg_Inst_.name: cgc_sync__Sync_Mobile_App_Depl_Pkg_Inst__c
cgc_sync__Sync_Mobile_App_Depl_Pkg_Inst_.description: Maintains a record of the installed deployment packages, their installation timestamps, and devices on which those packages are deployed.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgc_sync__Deployment_Date_Time__c.description: Timestamp when the deployment package was deployed.

cgc_sync__Is_Current__c.description: Indicates whether the record is related to the latest installed deployment package (true) or not (false). The value is set by an event trigger.

cgc_sync__State__c.description: Status of the deployment package installation.

cgc_sync__Sync_Mobile_App_Depl_Pkg_As__c.description: Relation to the deployment package assignment.
